alert.note: Alert for Coconino; Yavapai (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 30 at 2:46PM MST until July 30 at 3:15PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: The National Weather Service in Flagstaff has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Coconino County in north central Arizona... Yavapai County in west central Arizona... * Until 315 PM MST. * At 246 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Ash Fork, or 32 miles north of Chino Valley, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Ash Fork. This includes the following highways... Business Interstate 40 near mile marker 146. Interstate 40 between mile markers 144 and 151. State Route 89 between mile markers 361 and 363. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
